title: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero (1983 TV series)
summary: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero[4] (also known as Action Force in the UK) is a half-hour American animated television series created by Ron Friedman.[5] Based on the toyline from Hasbro, the cartoon ran in syndication from 1983 to 1986.[6] 95 episodes were produced.[7]
